title: ICE: `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/native_libs.rs:61:48

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code ```Rust #![crate_type = "lib"] #[link(kind = "static", modifiers = "+whole-archive,+bundle")] extern {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (22f247c6f 2023-03-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 22f247c6f3ed388cb702d01c2ff27da658a8b353 commit-date: 2023-03-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
